Text.Language: Twbh m~P[#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc: abba Mica/l piana,wr/t/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, / our holy righteous Father / Abba Misael the Anchorite, / that he may forgive us our sins.
